== Biography ==

He married Delvina Jane KING, daughter of Samuel Allen KING Jr. (10 Nov 1829-13 May 1898) &amp; Delfina BROWN (15 Oct 1830-4 Aug 1913), in 1890.&nbsp;Born on 18 May 1870.&nbsp;Delvina Jane died on 23 Aug 1938.&nbsp;Buried in Cummings Cem., Maud, OK
